text: @ThunderousP71 @xipolitos1 @NamelessGhoulTX @MVHarper @Tazerface16 Back in the late 80s we still had all kinds of different ways of accessing the Internet. The best way was to have an University Account, but you could pay a few thousand a month for others *nl* The big players, MS, Apple, IBM and Xerox  came up with a standard for Internet
